column2: [Root.GetFullName] wants to earn such fame and recognition that [Root.GetHerHis] name will be spoken across the Known Worlds.

[Root.GetFullName] is either unmarried or unsatisfied in [Root.GetHerHis] current marriage, wants to find a companion with whom [Root.GetSheHe] can spend the rest of [Root.GetHerHis] life in matrimony.

[Root.GetFullName] is either unmarried or unsatisfied in [Root.GetHerHis] current marriage, and has little interest in a romantic relationship. [Root.GetSheHeCap] wants to marry a powerful ruler, or manipulate [Root.GetHerHis] current spouse into a position above [Root.GetHerHis] own.
[Root.GetFullName] is feeling [Root.GetHerHis] genetic imperative, and wants to have a child, either through cloning or the more conventional method.

column3: [This.GetFullName] désire devenir [Root.GetEmperorEmpress] de [This.Capital.Empire.GetName]. S'il est païen, cela permet à/au [This.GetObjectPronoun] l'utilisation illimitée de l'assujettissement casus belli au sein du royaume.
column4: [This.GetFullName] möchte [Root.GetEmperorEmpress] von [This.Capital.Empire.GetName] werden. Bei heidnischer Herrschaft erlaubt dies [This.GetObjectPronoun] die unbegrenzte Verwendung des Kriegsgrunds Unterwerfung in diesem Königreich.
column6: [This.GetFullName] quiere convertirse en [Root.GetEmperorEmpress] de [This.Capital.Empire.GetName]. Si es pagano, permite a [This.GetObjectPronoun] el uso ilimitado de la Casus Belli Subyugación dentro del reino.
